title: Rational sonochemical engineering of Ag<sub>2</sub>CrO<sub>4</sub>/g-C<sub>3</sub>N<sub>4</sub> heterojunction for eradicating RhB dye under full broad spectrum
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Ali Alsalme, Mohamed M. Hassan, Mohamed A. Eltawil, A.E. Amin, Ayman Soltan, M.F. Abdel Messih, M.A. Ahmed
